mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (id, name, age, email, telephone,address) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{age}, #{email}, #{telephone},#{address})
mapper.update: UPDATE user set name = #{name}, age = #{age}, email = #{email}, telephone = #{telephone}, address = #{address} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT username,password FROM admin WHERE username = #{param1} and password = #{param2}
